meanings.definition: To pursue or chase after someone or something in order to catch or overtake them.
meanings.sent1: The cat was outpursuing the mouse in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The detective was outpursuing the suspect through the crowded streets.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy was outpursuing its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The athlete was outpursuing the world record in the race.
meanings.sent5: The determined student was outpursuing excellence in her studies.

meanings.definition: To engage in a pursuit or chase in order to achieve a goal or objective.
meanings.sent1: The explorer was outpursuing the hidden treasure in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The entrepreneur was outpursuing success in the competitive market.
meanings.sent3: The chef was outpursuing the perfect recipe for the new dish.
meanings.sent4: The scientist was outpursuing the cure for the rare disease.
meanings.sent5: The artist was outpursuing creativity in her latest masterpiece.
